description: Commands to manage Azure Database for MySQL bindings.

commands.name: az spring-cloud app binding mysql add
commands.summary: Bind an Azure Database for MySQL with the app.
commands.syntax:
az spring-cloud app binding mysql add --app
                                      --database-name
                                      --key
                                      --name
                                      --resource-group
                                      --resource-id
                                      --service
                                      --username

commands.name: az spring-cloud app binding mysql update
commands.summary: Update an Azure Database for MySQL service binding of the app.
commands.syntax:
az spring-cloud app binding mysql update --app
                                         --name
                                         --resource-group
                                         --service
                                         [--database-name]
                                         [--key]
                                         [--username]
